name: Robotry! Prototype
description:
Hey you! Try out the prototype for our new game :) You control the limbs of the robot, the body balances itself.  We hope to get feedback on the movement and controls. Thanks! 

Controls (gamepad required):

Left analog stick - left foot
Right analog stick - right foot
Left trigger - Grab with left foot
Right trigger - Grab with right foot
B - Toggle box mode

If you like the game please drop a comment and wishlish on Steam!

We also have a Discord server, you can join up from this link: https://discord.gg/daMVG9sf56
